answers.answer: Hi!Your son could just be going through growing blues or he may be too stressed and anxious over some thing. Depression is also quite common in this age and so are eating disorders in an attempt to lose weight. Other possibilities are diabetes, hyperthyroidism, worms in stool etc. Please consult a doctor to rule out these causes. Take care!

question: My 16 year old 6ft tall son has lost his appetite, and appears to have lost a little weight, he is a quite lad and since the berth of  his demanding step brother 5 years ago has retread to playing his xbox in his room, he has recently started college which we know has been stress full for him, he has also had a big growth spurt  over the last few months, he has started to miss out meals through the day and has started drinking water whilst at college, there are no drugs or alcohol abuse involved.....do I need to worry?
title: 16 year old has lost hi appetite
